description: This 44 kilometre trail starts at the Guysborough Harbour and goes up above Chedabucto Bay, the largest bay on the Nova Scotia Atlantic coast. This scenic trail has spectacular bay views, a suspension bridge and waterfalls.
directions: The trail starts at the Marina in Guysborough.You need to add Guysborough to your list of communities in Nova Scotia. It is the local seat of government.
title: Guysborough Nature Trail - Trans Canada Trail
